text: Va masali kasone, ki amvoli xudro ʙaroi talaʙi xusnudii Alloh taolo va ʙa xotiri ʙovare, ki dar dilhojason [ʙa podosi Alloh taolo] dorand, infoq mekunand, hamcun ʙustone ʙar teppae ast, ki ʙoroni tunde ʙar on ʙorad va mevahojasro ducandon ʙa ʙor ovarad; va agar ʙoroni tunde ham ʙa on narasad, ʙoroni saʙuk [niz zamini pokasro pursamar mesozad]; va Alloh taolo az on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
